channel.title: How many deathstages is it possible to have?
channel.description: I mean not the deathstage 1, 2, 0 and those but the if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !inRegionZ() && !inRegionS() && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave() && isInCastleWars()) { thing! Please help if you know or even understand what i mean! Thanks!

item.title: How many deathstages is it possible to have?
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

Okay now i know that but i still got the same problem!!
How to make that when you’re on deathstage == 2 you will not loose all your items and will NOT get disconnected?!?
This maybe very tricky to tell me cuz you don’t have same source but, Mods and other very trusted people just ask and i will send you the client.java…THE BIGGEST THANKS I’VE EVER GIVEN IF YOU HELP!
AND it worked for me before i added some stuff…DON’T say “delete the new junk you just added” cuz it’s a lot i’ve added…

Read full topic

And BTW i’m using delta heavily modified

item.title: How many deathstages is it possible to have?
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

No! Sorry for being un-specific! I got this problem: If You’re not admin and die to a npc you get the connection lost message and loose ALL of your items! AND when it re-estabilishes you are in the same spot as when you died! I got no more clue how to fix this i tried to change the thing that says that if you’re wearing a specified cape you spawn to a different location to that if you have a specified quest stage you respawn to a location specified to!Hope anyone understands now…

Read full topic
